scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/core/dist packages/forum/dist packages/issue/dist packages/orchestrator/dist packages/cli/dist packages/server/dist
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:packages && chmod +x packages/cli/dist/cli.js && chmod +x packages/server/dist/cli.js
scripts.build:packages: tsc -p packages/core/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/forum/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/issue/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/orchestrator/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/server/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p packages/cli/tsconfig.build.json
scripts.pack:smoke: bun run build && bun run scripts/pack-smoke.ts
scripts.web:test: bun run web:build && cd packages/web && bun run e2e
scripts.check: biome check --write --error-on-warnings . && bun run typecheck && bun run build && bun test
scripts.publish:all: bun run build && npm publish --access public -w packages/core && npm publish --access public -w packages/forum && npm publish --access public -w packages/issue && npm publish --access public -w packages/orchestrator && npm publish --access public -w packages/cli && npm publish --access public -w packages/server
